mapper.select: SELECT R.ROLE_ID, R.ROLE_NAME, R.DESCRIPTION, R.SYS_UPDATE_TIME, R.SYS_CREATE_TIME FROM SYS_USER_ROLE UR,SYS_ROLE R WHERE UR.ROLE_ID = R.ROLE_ID AND UR.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT U.SU_ID, U.USER_ID, U.USER_NAME, U.PHONE_NUM, U.BIRTHDAY, IR.ROLE_NAME, IFNULL(FR.FRIENDS,0) FRIENDS, IFNULL(FA.FANS,0) FANS, U.SEX, U.PHOTO, U.E_MAIL, U.BRIEF, U.STATE_CD, U.NOT_EXPIRED, U.NOT_LOCKED, U.CREDENTIALS_NOT_EXPIRED, U.SYS_UPDATE_TIME, U.SYS_CREATE_TIME FROM SYS_USER U LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT UR.USER_ID,R.ROLE_NAME FROM SYS_ROLE R,SYS_USER_ROLE UR WHERE R.ROLE_ID=UR.ROLE_ID AND UR.USER_ID = #{userId}) IR ON IR.USER_ID=U.USER_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT UFR.USER_ID,COUNT(UFR.FRIEND_ID) FRIENDS FROM USER_FRIENDS UFR WHERE UFR.USER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY UFR.FRIEND_ID) FR ON FR.USER_ID=U.USER_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT UFA.FRIEND_ID,COUNT(UFA.USER_ID) FANS FROM USER_FRIENDS UFA WHERE UFA.FRIEND_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY UFA.USER_ID) FA ON FA.FRIEND_ID=U.USER_ID WHERE U.USER_ID = #{userId}
